name: Plasma Charge
description:
A mobile turn-based game, where you need to physically walk to charge your weapons. 

Fight monsters and upgrade yourself and your favourite weapons while walking in the real world. The longer you walk the better you improve in this rouge-like turn-based mobile game!

The game is still under development - please leave feedback of your experience so I can improve it. Any constructive feedback will be highly appreciated!

This game was designed with Godot 3.2.

This game is licensed under GPL-3.0.

You can get the source code here:

https://github.com/GodRabbit/PlasmaCharge
